name: Danger in the Potager (LD52)
description:
The vegetables have gone rogue! Fend them off and defend your potager at all costs in this precision shooter. But beware: carrots are particularly hungry this time of year, and something even darker lurks in the fertile ground… 

Aim with your mouse then press D or F to smite the rogue vegetables. Survive a series of waves with various patterns to complete the stage. Things might get tougher as you progress, but do persevere, the ending is worth the grind (or so we think!). 

Press R for infinite mode in the title screen.

Best played on Desktop 

Made for Ludum Dare #52 with the Godot engine 

Art : Nayth 
Dev : Hamb 
Sound : Odey 
Game design : the whole bunch!

Hope you guys enjoy it!
